languages.text: {n}Тяжелый кулак проктора врезается в челюсть Терция, и окровавленный зуб со звоном бьется о стенку контейнера.{/n} "Учти сперва вот это. Больше никаких увиливаний и бреда, Вольный Торговец спрашивает, а ты отвечаешь, понял?"
languages.translation_comment:
Соломон
каунтер еретика
бьет клерка с руки

Соломон
каунтер еретика
бьет клерка с руки

languages.text: {n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжелый кулак проктора врезается в челюсть Терция, и окровавленный зуб со звоном бьется о стенку контейнера.{/n} "Учти сперва вот это. Больше никаких увиливаний и бреда, Вольный Торговец спрашивает, а ты отвечаешь, понял?"

{n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"

languages.text: {n}El pesado puño del Procurador se estrella contra la mandíbula de Tertius y un diente ensangrentado golpea un contenedor cercano.{/n} «Ten en cuenta esto. Se acabaron las distracciones y las excusas absurdas. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente pregunta y tú respondes. ¿Entendido?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El pesado puño del Procurador se estrella contra la mandíbula de Tertius y un diente ensangrentado golpea un contenedor cercano.{/n} «Ten en cuenta esto. Se acabaron las distracciones y las excusas absurdas. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente pregunta y tú respondes. ¿Entendido?».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙重重一拳，砸在特蒂乌斯的下巴上。一颗血淋淋的牙齿飞了出来，碰在附近集装箱的箱壁上，发出了“铛”的一声。{/n}“解释一下这到底是怎么回事，不准再找愚蠢的借口。行商浪人问什么，你就答什么，听懂了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙重重一拳，砸在特蒂乌斯的下巴上。一颗血淋淋的牙齿飞了出来，碰在附近集装箱的箱壁上，发出了“铛”的一声。{/n}“解释一下这到底是怎么回事，不准再找愚蠢的借口。行商浪人问什么，你就答什么，听懂了吗？”

languages.text: {n}代理人の重い拳がターティウスの顎に沈み込み、近くのコンテナの壁に血まみれの歯がぶつかって甲高い音を立てる。{/n}「これも数えておくんだな。もう回りくどいことや馬鹿げた言い訳を並べるな。ローグトレーダーが尋ね、お前が答える。わかったな？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"

traits.locale_text: {n}代理人の重い拳がターティウスの顎に沈み込み、近くのコンテナの壁に血まみれの歯がぶつかって甲高い音を立てる。{/n}「これも数えておくんだな。もう回りくどいことや馬鹿げた言い訳を並べるな。ローグトレーダーが尋ね、お前が答える。わかったな？」

languages.text: {n}Le poing massif du proctor percute de plein fouet la mâchoire de Tertius, et une dent sanguinolente vole contre la paroi d'un conteneur proche.{/n} « Consignez plutôt ça. Fini, les faux fuyants et les excuses ridicules. Ici, c'est {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qui pose les questions, et vous avez intérêt à y répondre. C'est bien compris ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le poing massif du proctor percute de plein fouet la mâchoire de Tertius, et une dent sanguinolente vole contre la paroi d'un conteneur proche.{/n} « Consignez plutôt ça. Fini, les faux fuyants et les excuses ridicules. Ici, c'est {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qui pose les questions, et vous avez intérêt à y répondre. C'est bien compris ? »

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen'in ağır yumruğu, Tertius'un çenesine iniyor. Sonrasında kanlı bir diş, yakındaki bir konteynerin duvarına çarpıyor.{/n} "Bunu da hesaba kat. Artık kaçamak cevaplar veya aptalca bahaneler yok. Hür Tacir soracak, sen cevaplayacaksın. Tamam mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Üsteğmen'in ağır yumruğu, Tertius'un çenesine iniyor. Sonrasında kanlı bir diş, yakındaki bir konteynerin duvarına çarpıyor.{/n} "Bunu da hesaba kat. Artık kaçamak cevaplar veya aptalca bahaneler yok. Hür Tacir soracak, sen cevaplayacaksın. Tamam mı?"

languages.text: {n}Die schwere Faust des Proktors zerschmettert Tertius' Kiefer und ein blutiger Zahn fliegt gegen die Wand eines nahen Containers.{/n} "Quantifiziert das hier. Keine Ausflüchte oder idiotische Entschuldigungen mehr. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} fragt und Ihr antwortet. Verstanden?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's heavy fist crashes into Tertius's jaw, and a bloodied tooth clangs against the wall of a nearby container.{/n} "Account for this. No more evasiveness or asinine excuses. The Rogue Trader asks, and you answer. Is that understood?"
